review:
My age is 46

I went for my multiple issues regarding  like Anxiety , heart etc.
Sir listened my all issues very patiently nd gave enough time to resolve my problems.
With his consultancy nd prescribed medicines....within 5 days I got relief.

I really thanks Dr. Harprit ji for his treatment. üôè

Very cooperative and friendly doctor.** ** *** **** ******* Sir treatment was very friendly and suggest the best treatment options to me.
I totally recommend them and if you are looking for best quality Medical treatment then do visit him.may God bless you

review: I visied the doctor for cough and pain in my throat. He listened to all my worries very patiently and addressed all the concerns I had. He thoroughly examined all the symptoms before writing the prescription. He was very friendly and gained my trust with this experience.

tags: None
review: Dr harprit sir is highly professional and the level of experience and patience they serve to there patient is highly commendable. We been to many doctors but all of them never gave us the proper time to understand my mom issues since mom was suffering from many deficiencies but he remained very calm and treated my mom with full guidance and proper medication even sometimes we used to call for some more guidance but doctor was always very calm and used to answer everything, I would highly recommend because of his experience and expertise!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctor is friendly and patiently heard me out first, asked questions to understand, and then suggested appropriate action. 
The doctor made me very comfortable and at ease.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Overall satisfied with him. Extremely happy with the treatment . I must recommend him for the guidance and treatment
